p.k: A fascinating look at the life and work of Peter O'Toole, the late stage and film actor who shot to fame by playing TE Lawrence in Lawrence of Arabia
An intimate portrait of Joan Fontaine, the Academy Award-winning actress who appeared in such films as Rebecca , Suspicion (1941), Jane Eyre (1944) and Othello (1952)

p.n: Enrico Caruso: Legends Of Opera I (11)
p.k: A fascinating look at the life and career of Enrico Caruso, the Italian tenor who starred at the Metropolitan Opera in the early 20th century
All-female Irish music sensation Celtic Woman perform a charming, feel-good concert of Celtic tunes, as well as songs including Amazing Grace, Raise Me Up and Danny Boy
Competition in which budding artists are challenged to paint a scene in four hours
Edward the Conqueror When Edward grows tired of his wife Louisa's obsession with a stray cat and decides to get rid of it, Louisa exacts her revenge
A Dip in the Pool An American gambler must come up with a cunning plan to slow down a ship at sea in order to win a bet
A fascinating look at the life and work of Peter O'Toole, the late stage and film actor who shot to fame by playing TE Lawrence in Lawrence of Arabia
An intimate portrait of Joan Fontaine, the Academy Award-winning actress who appeared in such films as Rebecca , Suspicion (1941), Jane Eyre (1944) and Othello (1952)
The State of the Union is Not Good America goes from bad to worse as the country deals with one crisis after another throughout the Ford and Carter years
The Way Up To Heaven Mrs Foster exacts an intriguing revenge on her husband after his dawdling causes her to miss a flight
Depart in Peace Art dealer Lionel gets an artist to visualise his fiancee Janet nude and paint her accordingly. Janet, however, does not see the funny side
Stephen Mangan and Joan Bakewell hunt for the country's best landscape artist. The competition begins in Yorkshire, where the contestants paint Fountains Abbey
Frank Skinner and Joan Bakewell search for a new star portrait artist. The celebrity sitters opening the series are David Tennant, Michaela Coel and James Morrison
An eye-opening look at the remarkable career of Richard Harris, exploring his roles in movies such as This Sporting Life, A Man Called Horse and the Harry Potter films
A profile of James Coburn, the tough-guy actor in films that included Our Man Flint and The Magnificent Seven, who won an Academy Award in 1998 for his role in Affliction
Terrorism at Home and Abroad A look at the evolution of terrorism as we know it today, from the 1972 Munich Olympics massacre to the Bloody Friday bombings in Belfast

p.n: Landscape Artist Of The Year 2018 IV (2)
p.k: Stephen Mangan and Joan Bakewell welcome a new group of artists to Viking Bay in Kent, where they are challenged to paint the picturesque stretch of coastline
Comedian Noel Fielding, TV presenter Reggie Yates and model Daphne Selfe are the celebrity sitters this week as a group of artists attempts to impress the judges
